title: [Health] Suicides among men decreased after Viagra became more affordable in Sweden. In July 2013, the patent rights to Sildenafil (generic Viagra) ended in Sweden, causing the price of Viagra to drop by 75%.

[Epidemiology] Men and women living in rural areas have a life expectancy that's 2.5 years shorter than men and women living in urban areas. This divide has more than doubled since 1999, primarily due to worsening death rates from respiratory diseases, cardiovascular disease, and cancer.
